revised_title: Detailed Structure Analysis of Stilbene and its Dibenzyl Series
tldr: The authors conducted an X-ray diffraction analysis of the stilbene molecule and the dibenzyl series, determining the atomic positions and structure of the molecules. They found that the stilbene molecule has a planar structure with a carbon-carbon double bond distance of about 1.34 Å and a single bond distance of about 1.54 Å. The authors also discovered that there is resonance between two forms of the stilbene molecule, contributing to its structure and properties. This research provides a better understanding of the molecular structure and properties of stilbene and related compounds.
